about_the_game:
Do You Like Dogs?

Of course you do, because you are a cool person. Next question.

Do you like puzzles?

And I mean puzzles that involve more than just finding hidden objects, swapping gems, or pushing blocks around. Puzzles where you might need to pull out a piece of paper and think a bit. Maybe for a while, you feel a bit stupid because you aren't getting it, but then you have a 'Eureka' moment and suddenly feel really smart. If so, then you have come to the right place.

This is the demo for our upcoming release, Terrierble Logic. It will take you through 10 levels of the game to get a sense of what you're in for in the final release and hopefully you can make up your mind if it's something you'd like to play.

name: Terrierble Logic Demo
short_description: A game of logic, dogs, and questionable puns. Using the clues given, you'll arrange the elements and solve more than 75 puzzles that range from simple logic to fairly challenging. It is family-friendly and a fun way to engage with thinking in a logical way.
